title: Where can I get feedback for my college application essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, I had the same problem a while ago with my research proposal and I stumbled upon this site: fast-paper-editing. I made my point very clear that I needed an honest opinion about how good my essay was and my writer’s response met with my approval. A word of advice from my experience – no matter what service you use, don’t hesitate to get in touch with the writer directly and explain what exactly you are looking for. Because many services are mediators between a client and writer. Good luck with your application!
